title: Penthouse Suite
description: "Join me in my penthouse suite Sophia. I will make you feel things you have never felt before, your perfect body will come alive and reawaken in my arms, I promise you that. All you have to do is say yes and succumb."She always saw herself as fiercely independent, never wanted a man nor needed one. She suddenly began to doubt herself when he crashed into her life, literally, and span her functional world into chaos. He always wore a cold, hard exterior, never letting anyone in. His every thought always calculated carefully by the businessman that resided within him. This changed the day he set eyes on her and knew his life had changed forever. A story of two souls in an unforgettable journey of torment, seduction and love.
author: Chantelle Lloyd
